de.fhb.sailboat.control.navigator

Class NavigatorImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fhb.sailboat.control.navigator.NavigatorImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Navigator

    public class NavigatorImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements Navigator
    Implementation of Navigator which calculates commands based on the Task to execute. The commands are hand over to a Pilot.
    Author:
    hscheel
